name: Kaiser Herzog
description: Kaiser Herzog is a member of theMaelstromand aripperdocin their service. He gained the nickname "the Surgeon" for his exploits but became a wanted fugitive by theNCPDfor practicing without a license, as well as first-degree murder, for which he was sentenced to death.Vcan encounter the Surgeon inClean Cutin theNorthside Industrial District, and is tasked by the NCPD dispatcher to take care of him.
